welcome_message_body: Welcome to Colchester, a charming and historic town known for its Roman heritage, beautiful architecture, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, visit our museums, and enjoy the unique charm of our town.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Colchester.
restaurants.address: 133 Blakely Rd (Jiffy Mart Gas Station C-Store), Colchester, VT 05446

restaurants.name: McGillicuddy's on the Green
restaurants.description: McGillicuddy's on the Green is a irish pub located in Colchester.

restaurants.description: New York Pizza Oven is a pizzeria located in Colchester.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wethersfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southend Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport is the largest and busiest, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free basic access and premium options for purchase.
